EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 450 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-09N 012-03E AT 201950Z JUN. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
